name: mirror (itch) (nastiplasti)
description:
Our second game! Game jam entry for MAKE-A-LEVEL LEAP DAY JAM.

Mirror
Plasti cannot remember how she ended up. Help her to leave her nightmare. At least one level.

NastiPlasti Team
@nastiplastigame
Pablo Conca: Programming
Laura Nieto: Pixel art and music

Thanks for playing ;)
